cnit.title: Courses for CNIT Department at City College of San Francisco
cnit.message: Included are the 3 different courses I teach at City College of San Francisco.
cnit.course: CNIT-100 Introduction to Computers Science Building - Room #8 Hardware and Software Internet, E-mail Basics of MS Office
CNIT-131 Internet and Introduction to HTML Mission Campus - Room #475 and Art Building - Room #183 Internet and basic concepts Security Basics of HTML
CNIT-132 Intermediate HTML/XHTML Science Building - Room #8 Basics of HTML Intermediate XHTML JavaScript, CSS
CNIT-134 ASP.NET Online Course Intro to Visual Studio Intro to ASP.NET Working with .NET Controls
